Alteration 7

Phoenix Pyre
Combat
F2
spell id [id]: 679
effect number [effect_number]: 23
damage [damage]: 134217728
spec [spec]: 16384
casting time [casttime]: 100%
area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 20-
Bless/Buff: Phoenix Pyre
 
(Ignores Shields [ignoreshield])
This spell gives the mage limited immortality. When the mage is slain, he will explode in a cloud of fire and reappear somewhere else on the battlefield. The spell lasts for the entire battle, no matter how many times the mage is killed. However, being killed is exhausting and the spell will not work while the mage is unconscious.
Explosion damage: 10 AP fire dmg, explosion area 50, fatigue upon death: 30+d20.
